structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Underemployment Part-Time Work Sub-Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of underemployment part-time work subcategories indicating whether individuals working part-time are doing so due to underemployment reasons.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Yes
structure:Code.common:Description: Individuals working part-time due to underemployment reasons (e.g., could not find full-time work, economic reasons, etc.).

structure:Code.common:Name: No
structure:Code.common:Description: Individuals working part-time for reasons other than underemployment (e.g., personal choice, education, family responsibilities, etc.).
